addVerificationRecord(uint256,string,str.details: Links QA documentation and approval to component

approve(address,uint256).details: Gives permission to `to` to transfer `tokenId` token to another account. The approval is cleared when the token is transferred. Only a single account can be approved at a time, so approving the zero address clears previous approvals. Requirements: - The caller must own the token or be an approved operator. - `tokenId` must exist. Emits an {Approval} event.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the number of tokens in ``owner``'s account.

childTokensOf(uint256,address).details: For ERC-998, we only track same-contract children

params.childContract: Child contract address (must be this contract)

constructor.details: Sets up ERC-721 with name and symbol

getApproved(uint256).details: Returns the account approved for `tokenId` token. Requirements: - `tokenId` must exist.

getChildTokens(uint256).details: Returns all children without requiring contract address

returns._0: Parent token ID (0 if no parent)

getSubgraph(uint256).details: Performs BFS traversal to collect all descendants and their edges

params.rootTokenId: Root token ID to start traversal

returns.tokenIds: Array of token IDs in subgraph

getTokenType(uint256).details: Decodes token type from ID offset

getTokensByIfcType(string).details: Searches all tokens of a specific IFC type

returns._0: Array of token IDs matching the type

isApprovedForAll(address,address).details: Returns if the `operator` is allowed to manage all of the assets of `owner`. See {setApprovalForAll}

mintBuildingGraph(address,bytes32,string.details: This is the main entry point for tokenizing a complete building design

returns.projectTokenId: The token ID of the top-level project

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

ownerOf(uint256).details: Returns the owner of the `tokenId` token. Requirements: - `tokenId` must exist.

ownerOfChild(address,uint256).details: Returns parent owner and parent token ID

parentOf(uint256).details: Returns parent contract and token ID

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

rootOwnerOf(uint256).details: Traverses up the ownership tree to find the ultimate owner

rootOwnerOfChild(uint256).details: Returns detailed ownership information including parent token

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.details: Safely transfers `tokenId` token from `from` to `to`, checking first that contract recipients are aware of the ERC-721 protocol to prevent tokens from being forever locked. Requirements: - `from` cannot be the zero address. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - `tokenId` token must exist and be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must have been allowed to move this token by either {approve} or   {setApprovalForAll}. - If `to` refers to a smart contract, it must implement {IERC721Receiver-onERC721Received}, which is called upon   a safe transfer. Emits a {Transfer} event.
When transferring a parent, all children are transferred too

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).details: Approve or remove `operator` as an operator for the caller. Operators can call {transferFrom} or {safeTransferFrom} for any token owned by the caller. Requirements: - The `operator` cannot be the address zero. Emits an {ApprovalForAll} event.

tokenByIndex(uint256).details: Returns a token ID at a given `index` of all the tokens stored by the contract. Use along with {totalSupply} to enumerate all tokens.

tokenOfOwnerByIndex(address,uint256).details: Returns a token ID owned by `owner` at a given `index` of its token list. Use along with {balanceOf} to enumerate all of ``owner``'s tokens.

tokenURI(uint256).details: Returns the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for `tokenId` token.

totalSupply().details: Returns the total amount of tokens stored by the contract.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfers `tokenId` token from `from` to `to`. WARNING: Note that the caller is responsible to confirm that the recipient is capable of receiving ERC-721 or else they may be permanently lost. Usage of {safeTransferFrom} prevents loss, though the caller must understand this adds an external call which potentially creates a reentrancy vulnerability. Requirements: - `from` cannot be the zero address. - `to` cannot be the zero address. - `tokenId` token must be owned by `from`. - If the caller is not `from`, it must be approved to move this token by either {approve} or {setApprovalForAll}. Emits a {Transfer} event.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateConstructionStatus(uint256,uint8).details: Only owner or approved can update status

addVerificationRecord(uint256,string,str.notice: Add verification record for a component

childTokensOf(uint256,address).notice: Get all child tokens of a parent

getMintedCounts().notice: Get total minted tokens per type

getNodeEdges(uint256).notice: Get all edges for a node (adjacency list)

getSubgraph(uint256).notice: Get complete subgraph starting from a root node

getTokenByKuzuId(string).notice: Get token by Kuzu element ID

getTokenByTopologicId(string).notice: Get token by TopologicPy vertex ID

getTokenType(uint256).notice: Get token type from token ID

getVerificationRecords(uint256).notice: Get all verification records for a component

ifcGuidToTokenId(string).notice: Mapping from IFC GUID to token ID

kuzuToTokenId(bytes32).notice: Mapping from Kuzu element ID hash to token ID

mintBuildingGraph(address,bytes32,string.notice: Mint an entire building graph from Kuzu database export

nodeEdges(uint256,uint256).notice: Mapping from token ID to adjacency list (lateral graph edges)

nodeMetadata(uint256).notice: Mapping from token ID to graph node metadata

rootOwnerOf(uint256).notice: Get the root owner of a token

rootOwnerOfChild(uint256).notice: Get root owner and parent information

safeTransferChild(uint256,address,uint25.notice: Safe transfer child to another parent

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.notice: Override safeTransferFrom to implement cascading transfers

topologicToTokenId(string).notice: Mapping from TopologicPy vertex ID to token ID

transferAsChild(address,uint256,address,.notice: Transfer token from one parent to another

transferChild(uint256,address,address,ui.notice: Transfer child from parent to address

transferFromParent(address,uint256,addre.notice: Transfer token from parent to address

updateConstructionStatus(uint256,uint8).notice: Update construction status of a component
